22 # ifndef __ROUTER_CFS_HPP__
23 # define __ROUTER_CFS_HPP__
24 
25 # include <xkrt/consts.h>
26 # include <xkrt/memory/routing/router.hpp>
27 # include <xkrt/sync/bits.h>
28 
29 # include <stdint.h>
30 
32 class RouterCFS : public Router
33 {
34  public:
35  typedef struct xkrt_router_cfs_map_t
36  {
37  struct {
38  uint8_t weight;
39  bool used;
40  } values[XKRT_DEVICES_MAX][XKRT_DEVICES_MAX];
41 
42  xkrt_router_cfs_map_t(const uint8_t weights[XKRT_DEVICES_MAX][XKRT_DEVICES_MAX])
43  {
44  for (xkrt_device_global_id_t i = 0 ; i < XKRT_DEVICES_MAX ; ++i)
45  {
46  for (xkrt_device_global_id_t j = 0 ; j < XKRT_DEVICES_MAX ; ++j)
47  {
48  values[i][j].weight = weights[i][j];
49  values[i][j].used = false;
50  }
51  }
52  }
53  } xkrt_router_cfs_map_t;
54 
55  public:
56 
64  const xkrt_router_cfs_map_t map;
65 
66  public:
67 
68  RouterCFS(const uint8_t weights[XKRT_DEVICES_MAX][XKRT_DEVICES_MAX]) : weights(weights) {}
69  ~RouterCFS() {}
70 
71  /* @override */
72  xkrt_device_global_id_t
73  get_source(
74  const xkrt_device_global_id_t dst,
75  const xkrt_device_global_id_bitfield_t valid
76  ) const {
77 
78  /* fast way out: valid on that device already */
79  if (valid & (1 << dst))
80  return dst;
81 
82  // TODO
83 
84  /* get any random device */
85  return (xkrt_device_global_id_t) (__random_set_bit(valid) - 1);
86  }
87 
88 };
89 
90 # endif /* __ROUTER_CFS_HPP__ */
